name: stock-crypto-analyzer
description: Real-time stock and cryptocurrency quotes, technical analysis (SMA, RSI, MACD, Bollinger Bands), symbol comparison, and price alert watchlists. Requires a platform gateway adapter for market data access.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: stock_crypto_analyzer
toolDefinition.description: Analyze stocks and cryptocurrencies: get quotes, run technical analysis (SMA, RSI, MACD, Bollinger Bands), compare symbols, and manage price alert watchlists. Layer 2 skill requiring platform gateway for market data.

action.description: quote (current price), analyze (technical analysis), compare (multi-symbol comparison), watchlist_add/remove/list (manage watchlist), alert (check triggered alerts)

symbol.description: Ticker symbol (e.g. AAPL, BTC, ETH). Required for quote, analyze, watchlist_add, watchlist_remove.

symbols.description: Array of ticker symbols for compare action.
